questions.description: Cuba's National Assembly is expected to elect a president on April 19, 2018 ( https://www.reuters.com/article/us-cuba-election/cuba-holds-one-party-vote-as-post-castro-era-looms-idUSKCN1GN05H,Miami Herald 2 ).
questions.name: Will Cuba's National assembly elect Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez as President of Cuba’s Council of States and the Council of Ministers on 19 April 2018?

answers.name: Yes
answers.question_name: Will Cuba's National assembly elect Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez as President of Cuba’s Council of States and the Council of Ministers on 19 April 2018?

questions.description: The legislative election is scheduled for 22 April 2018.
questions.name: Will the Colorado party win fewer than 41 seats in Paraguay’s election for the Chamber of Deputies on 22 April 2018?

answers.name: Yes
answers.question_name: Will the Colorado party win fewer than 41 seats in Paraguay’s election for the Chamber of Deputies on 22 April 2018?

questions.description: This question will be resolved using the last daily London Bullion Market Association (LBMA) Gold Price USD (PM) http://www.lbma.org.uk/pricing-and-statistics for the date of interest. The relevant data is available by selecting 'Table' and referring to the 'PM' column under 'USD.' Question will be closed on the day before the date of interest and resolved the day after the date of interest.

questions.description: This question will be resolved using data from the International Monetary Fund (http://data.imf.org/regular.aspx?key=61015893). To access the relevant data: - Select the country of interest from the Country drop down menu - Select 'Consumer Price Index, All Items' from the Indicator drop down menu. The relevant row is: 'Malawi, Consumer Price Index, All Items,' and the relevant column is '2018M04'. Question will be resolved based on initially reported values.
questions.name: What will be the monthly Period-over-Period change in the consumer price index (CPI) for Malawi in April (Month 04) 2018?

answers.name: More than 8.4

questions.description: The Armed Conflict Location and Event Dataset (ACLED) summarizes press reports on conflict and protest events in Africa and parts of Asia. The relevant data can be accessed using the export tool at https://www.acleddata.com/data/: set ‘From’ to the first day of the period of interest; ‘To’ to the last day of the period of interest; and ‘Country’ to the country of interest. Click ‘Export.’ The question will resolve as "yes" if ACLED records any event for which ‘event_type’ is Riots/Protests. Question will be resolved when the relevant data is first released. If a qualifying event is recorded, the question will be closed retroactively with the date of the first event as the end date of the question.
questions.name: Will ACLED record any riot/protest events in Gabon in April 2018?

answers.name: Yes
answers.question_name: Will ACLED record any riot/protest events in Gabon in April 2018?

questions.description: This question will be resolved using Privacy Rights Clearinghouse's Chronology of Data Breaches (https://www.privacyrights.org/data-breaches). To access the relevant data: - Select 'Hacking or Malware (HACK)' as the type of breach, - Select '2018' as the year, - Click 'Search Data Breaches', - Download the 'Data Breach File', - Count the number of entries, for all organizations, in which 'Date Made Public' falls in the month of interest. The question will be resolved using data from the last day of the following month.
questions.name: How many 'hacking or malware (HACK)' data breaches will Privacy Rights Clearinghouse record in April 2018?

answers.name: Less than 15
answers.question_name: How many 'hacking or malware (HACK)' data breaches will Privacy Rights Clearinghouse record in April 2018?

answers.name: Between 15 and 24, inclusive
answers.question_name: How many 'hacking or malware (HACK)' data breaches will Privacy Rights Clearinghouse record in April 2018?

answers.name: More than 24 but less than 33
answers.question_name: How many 'hacking or malware (HACK)' data breaches will Privacy Rights Clearinghouse record in April 2018?

answers.name: Between 33 and 45, inclusive
answers.question_name: How many 'hacking or malware (HACK)' data breaches will Privacy Rights Clearinghouse record in April 2018?

answers.name: More than 45
answers.question_name: How many 'hacking or malware (HACK)' data breaches will Privacy Rights Clearinghouse record in April 2018?
